title: Inception
description: Sci-fi action thriller about dream invasion and layered reality. Directed by Christopher Nolan. A skilled thief enters people's dreams to steal secrets but is tasked with planting an idea instead.

title: Stranger Things
description: Horror sci-fi series about kids in a small town facing supernatural events from an alternate dimension called the Upside Down. Set in the 1980s with nostalgic references.

title: The Matrix
description: Action sci-fi with philosophical themes about reality and simulation. Neo discovers the world is a computer simulation and joins a rebellion against machine overlords.

title: Friends
description: Comedy sitcom about six friends living in New York City, dealing with relationships, careers, and everyday life with humor and heart.

title: Breaking Bad
description: Crime drama about a high school chemistry teacher who turns to cooking methamphetamine after being diagnosed with cancer to secure his family's future.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Superhero action film featuring Batman facing his greatest challenge against the Joker. A psychological battle between order and chaos in Gotham City.

title: The Office
description: Mockumentary comedy series about employees at a paper company in Scranton, PA. Features awkward humor and character development through daily office life.

title: Interstellar
description: Space exploration epic about humanity's search for a new home planet. Combines hard science fiction with emotional storytelling about family and sacrifice.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Epic fantasy series set in medieval-like world with political intrigue, warfare, and dragons. Multiple storylines converge in a battle for the Iron Throne.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: Nonlinear crime film with interconnected stories of Los Angeles criminals. Known for its dialogue, pop culture references, and unique narrative structure.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Drama about hope and friendship in prison. A banker wrongly convicted of murder befriends fellow inmates and becomes instrumental in money laundering operation.

title: The Godfather
description: Crime saga about the powerful Italian-American crime family. The aging patriarch transfers control to his reluctant son, exploring themes of power and family.

title: Schindler's List
description: Historical drama about Oskar Schindler saving over 1,000 Jews during the Holocaust. A powerful story of humanity in the darkest of times.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: Epic fantasy conclusion where Aragorn claims his throne and Frodo destroys the One Ring. Grand battles and emotional character arcs conclude the trilogy.

title: Forrest Gump
description: Life story of a simple man who inadvertently influences major historical events. Heartwarming tale about love, friendship, and the American dream.

title: Fight Club
description: Psychological thriller about an insomniac office worker who forms an underground fight club. Dark commentary on consumerism and masculinity.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: Fantasy epic where a hobbit inherits a ring of power and must destroy it. Beginning of the epic journey across Middle-earth with a fellowship of heroes.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
description: Space opera about a young farmer who joins a rebellion against an evil empire. Classic hero's journey with iconic characters and groundbreaking special effects.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
description: Fantasy epic continuing the quest to destroy the One Ring. The fellowship splits as they face new challenges and the corruption of power.

title: Goodfellas
description: Crime biographical film about the rise and fall of a mob associate. Based on a true story, showcasing the glamorous and violent world of organized crime.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: Psychological horror thriller about an FBI trainee seeking help from imprisoned cannibal Hannibal Lecter to catch another killer. Intense cat-and-mouse game.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: War drama about soldiers searching for a paratrooper behind enemy lines during D-Day. Realistic portrayal of World War II combat and sacrifice.

title: The Green Mile
description: Supernatural drama about a death row corrections officer who discovers one of his charges has a miraculous gift. Story of compassion and redemption.

title: Se7en
description: Neo-noir psychological thriller about two detectives hunting a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as motives. Dark and disturbing crime story.

title: Titanic
description: Romance and disaster epic about the ill-fated maiden voyage of RMS Titanic. Love story between passengers from different social classes.

title: Avatar
description: Sci-fi epic about a paraplegic marine who infiltrates an alien world through an avatar body. Environmental themes with groundbreaking 3D technology.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: Superhero epic conclusion to the Marvel Cinematic Universe's Infinity Saga. The Avengers attempt to reverse Thanos' devastating snap.

title: The Departed
description: Crime thriller about an undercover cop and a police informant in the Boston mob. Psychological tension builds as both sides try to expose the other.

title: The Prestige
description: Mystery thriller about two rival magicians in Victorian London. Their obsession with creating the perfect illusion leads to dangerous consequences.

title: Gladiator
description: Historical epic about a Roman general who becomes a gladiator seeking revenge against the emperor who murdered his family. Action and political intrigue.

title: The Sopranos
description: Crime drama about a New Jersey mob boss balancing family life with running a criminal organization. Groundbreaking psychological depth in television.

title: The Wire
description: Crime drama exploring Baltimore's drug scene from multiple perspectives - police, dealers, politicians, and media. Realistic portrayal of urban decay.

title: True Detective
description: Anthology crime series with each season featuring different characters and mysteries. Philosophical themes and atmospheric storytelling.

title: Sherlock
description: Modern adaptation of Arthur Conan Doyle's detective stories set in 21st century London. Brilliant deduction and contemporary technology.

title: Westworld
description: Sci-fi series about a futuristic theme park populated by android hosts. Explores consciousness, free will, and the nature of humanity.

title: The Crown
description: Historical drama chronicling the reign of Queen Elizabeth II and the British royal family. Political and personal challenges across decades.

title: Narcos
description: Crime drama about the Colombian drug cartels and DEA agents trying to bring them down. Based on true events of the cocaine trade.

title: House of Cards
description: Political drama about a ruthless politician's rise to power in Washington D.C. Manipulation, corruption, and ambition in American politics.

title: Mindhunter
description: Crime series about FBI agents in the late 1970s interviewing imprisoned serial killers to solve ongoing cases. Psychological profiling origins.

title: Black Mirror
description: Anthology sci-fi series exploring dark aspects of technology and society. Each episode presents a dystopian vision of near-future scenarios.

title: Better Call Saul
description: Crime drama prequel to Breaking Bad focusing on lawyer Jimmy McGill's transformation into Saul Goodman. Character study of moral decline.

title: Fargo
description: Anthology crime series inspired by the Coen Brothers film. Dark comedy and crime in small-town America with quirky characters.

title: The Mandalorian
description: Star Wars series about a bounty hunter protecting a mysterious child in the outer rim. Space western with practical effects and puppetry.

title: Chernobyl
description: Historical drama miniseries about the 1986 nuclear disaster and its aftermath. Harrowing portrayal of the worst nuclear accident in history.

title: The Witcher
description: Fantasy series about Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts. Based on Polish novels.

title: Money Heist
description: Spanish heist thriller about a criminal mastermind and his team robbing the Royal Mint of Spain. Complex plot with flashbacks and character development.

title: Dark
description: German sci-fi thriller about time travel and family secrets across multiple generations. Complex narrative spanning different time periods.

title: The Boys
description: Superhero satire about a group of vigilantes fighting corrupt superheroes. Dark and violent deconstruction of the superhero genre.

title: Ozark
description: Crime drama about a financial advisor who must launder money for a Mexican cartel while relocating his family to the Ozarks.

title: The Queen's Gambit
description: Coming-of-age drama about a chess prodigy's rise to the top of the chess world while struggling with addiction. 1960s period piece.

title: Squid Game
description: Korean survival drama about desperate people competing in children's games for a massive cash prize. Social commentary on economic inequality.
